channel.title: Putting a Client Online (Open to other players)
channel.description: Okay, I have a client thats up, running & ready to go.. all I need is someone's help on how to put it ONLINE so other players can join.. Thanks :)

item.title: Putting a Client Online (Open to other players)
item.dc:creator: @Ii_Claw_iI Ii Claw iI
item.description:
@Ii_Claw_iI wrote:

Just rar your client and upload to uppit or mediafire or any you know. Then add your server to all server statuse’s.

item.title: Putting a Client Online (Open to other players)
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

Stalkerish:

Okay, I have a client thats up, running & ready to go… all I need is someone’s help on how to put it ONLINE so other players can join… Thanks

Please go to the Server tut page and look for the topic how to create a server.

  1. you would need no-ip
  2. a source
  3. portforwarding
  4. a client
  5. advertise it on www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php
    ~123kdd100~

Read full topic
item.source: Putting a Client Online (Open to other players)
